com.direwolfdigital.cake.data.archetypes: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, draw a card.
com.direwolfdigital.cake.data.products.b: Thank you for attending your local Pokémon League! This code will unlock 4 foil Pikachu promo cards, 4 foil Boulder Badge promo cards, 4 foil Cascade Badge promo cards, and a set of XY—Evolutions themed card sleeves for you to enjoy or trade!

Thank you for attending your local Pokémon League! This code will unlock 4 foil Thunder Badge promo cards, 4 foil Rainbow Badge promo cards, 4 foil Soul Badge promo cards, and an XY—Evolutions themed deck box for you to enjoy or trade!

Thank you for attending your local Pokémon League! This code will unlock 4 foil Marsh Badge promo cards, 4 foil Volcano Badge promo cards, 4 foil Earth Badge promo cards, and an XY—Evolutions themed coin for you to enjoy or trade!
com.direwolfdigital.cake.rules.abilities: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.
Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Each Pokémon BREAK has no Abilities (this includes Abilities of its previous Evolution).
tpci.shiny.mega.gardevoir.description: Add a new dimension to your wardrobe with the Shiny Mega Gardevoir Trainer set.
tpci.xerneas.description: Look brilliant in this Trainer set styled after the Legendary Pokémon Xerneas.
tpci.yveltal.description: Get the look of the Legendary Pokémon Yveltal with this sharp Trainer set.
tpci.zygarde.description: Capture the spirit of the Legendary Pokémon Zygarde with this cool Trainer set.
